string.text:
A modernized version of the classic Soviet PSO-1 scope, featuring improved optics and a more refined reticle for precision shooting. It retains the iconic bullet-drop compensator for effective long-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A rugged 4x magnification scope used by Russian forces, known for its prismatic design and lightweight construction. It features a rangefinding reticle and illumination for low-light conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Soviet Union
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A versatile electronic reflex sight designed for rapid target acquisition in close-quarters and mid-range combat. It offers a clear, illuminated reticle for improved aiming speed and accuracy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Barska
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x

A fixed-power 4x scope developed by Trijicon, widely used for military applications due to its rugged construction and illuminated reticle. It excels in medium-range combat, offering excellent clarity and bullet-drop compensation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Trijicon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A holographic weapon sight designed for military and law enforcement, offering rapid target acquisition with a wide field of view. It features night vision compatibility and a durable waterproof construction.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]EOTech
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x

A fixed-power optical sight designed for use on Galil rifles, featuring a tritium-illuminated reticle for improved visibility in low-light conditions. Its prismatic design provides excellent clarity and rugged durability, making it a dependable choice for medium-range combat and precision shooting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Isreal
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Israel Military Industries
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A Russian reflex sight known for its durability and four selectable reticles. It provides a fast sight picture with a robust design suited for harsh battlefield conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Axion
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x

A Soviet-era fixed 4x magnification scope with a distinctive rangefinder reticle. Designed for designated marksman rifles, it provides reliable accuracy for medium-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]TsKIB SOO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

An advanced variant of the PSO-1M with improved lens coatings and better resistance to environmental conditions. It retains the classic reticle design for accurate long-range shooting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A compact and rugged scope originally designed for Soviet sniper rifles, offering fixed magnification and a simple yet effective reticle for long-range targeting. Known for its durability and ease of use, it remains a popular choice for marksmen using older rifles in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Soviet Union
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]3.5x

A German WWII-era 4x magnification scope designed for sniper rifles, featuring a simple reticle and rugged construction. It was widely used on Kar98k rifles for long-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Germany
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Nazi Germany
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]2.0x

A compact reflex sight known for its lightweight polymer construction and wide field of view. It is popular for competition shooting and tactical applications requiring rapid target engagement.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]C-More Systems
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A lightweight and compact reflex sight designed for rapid target acquisition, featuring a clear illuminated reticle for enhanced aiming in close to mid-range engagements. Its sturdy construction and adjustable brightness settings make it a reliable choice for both tactical and survival scenarios.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Barska
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]2.0x

A lower-magnification version of the ACOG series, designed for faster target acquisition while still providing some magnification for mid-range engagements. It features fiber optic and tritium illumination for all-light usability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Trijicon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]2.0x

A sound suppressor specifically designed for .45 ACP firearms, reducing noise and muzzle flash for improved stealth. Its subsonic-friendly design makes it ideal for tactical and covert operations where discretion is crucial.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] .45

A precision-engineered suppressor optimized for 5.7x28mm firearms, effectively lowering the muzzle report while maintaining ballistic performance. Built for use with high-velocity rounds, it provides enhanced noise reduction without compromising accuracy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Belgium
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.7mm

A dedicated suppressor for the Soviet 6P9 silenced pistol, designed to significantly dampen sound for covert operations. Its robust construction allows it to handle multiple shots with minimal sound leakage, making it highly effective for stealth engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm

A specialized suppressor built for the 9A-91 compact assault rifle and the VSK-94 sniper variant, ensuring reduced noise and muzzle flash. It enhances stealth capabilities without significantly impacting weapon performance, making it ideal for urban and reconnaissance missions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9x39mm

A versatile suppressor designed for 9mm firearms, offering effective noise suppression for pistols, submachine guns, and some carbines. Its compact and lightweight design ensures minimal impact on weapon handling while improving tactical effectiveness.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Varies
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm

A suppressor specifically designed for the APS underwater pistol, allowing it to operate with reduced noise both above and below the surface. Its unique engineering makes it a rare but valuable tool for special operations forces operating in aquatic environments.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm

A high-performance suppressor designed for tactical applications, balancing sound suppression with minimal impact on accuracy and recoil. It is constructed for durability and versatility, making it a preferred choice for both military and law enforcement units.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56mm, 7.62mm

A well-known suppressor brand offering lightweight and durable designs, engineered for superior noise reduction across various calibers. Its advanced materials and baffle system make it a reliable choice for professional shooters and tactical operators.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm, .45

A Russian-made suppressor designed for special forces, optimized for both subsonic and standard ammunition. Built for durability and effectiveness, it provides excellent noise reduction in combat and reconnaissance missions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62mm

A standardized suppressor used by NATO forces, designed for compatibility with a range of military firearms. Built to withstand harsh battlefield conditions, it ensures effective noise reduction without compromising durability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Belgium
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] .45, 5.56mm, 7.62mm

A Soviet-designed suppressor specifically made for AK-pattern rifles, effectively reducing sound and muzzle flash when paired with subsonic ammunition. Its robust construction ensures reliability in prolonged combat situations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62mm

A more modern evolution of the PBS series, designed for use with AK-74 rifles, providing superior noise reduction while maintaining firearm accuracy. It is widely used by special forces for stealth-oriented operations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45mm

A precision-engineered suppressor built for the SR-25 marksman rifle, designed to maintain accuracy while significantly reducing sound signature. Its advanced baffle system helps minimize recoil and muzzle flash, making it ideal for long-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62mm

A Russian-made suppressor designed for reducing noise and muzzle flash in various rifle calibers. Known for its simple yet effective design, it is frequently used in military applications requiring stealth.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45mm

A custom suppressor built for the SR-3M compact assault rifle, designed to enhance stealth in close-quarters combat. It seamlessly integrates with the weapon, ensuring effective noise suppression without compromising maneuverability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9x39mm

A military-grade suppressor designed for use with small-caliber rifles, reducing both sound and muzzle signature for increased battlefield stealth. Engineered for durability and long-term use, it enhances tactical effectiveness in covert operations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45mm

A specialized suppressor built for the SVU bullpup sniper rifle, designed to significantly reduce noise while maintaining long-range accuracy. Its integration with the rifle ensures effective sound dampening without impacting bullet trajectory or precision.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
